Care Connect Death Notification Status

A ValueSet to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-DeathNotificationStatus-1

name: Care Connect Death Notification Status
description: A ValueSet to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).
